        public static boolean hasPrivilege(java.lang.String privilege)
        Check if current user has specified role.
        参数:
        privilege - the role to check if user has.
        返回:
        true if user has specified role, otherwise false.

      • hasAnyPrivilege

        public static boolean hasAnyPrivilege(java.lang.String... privileges)
        Check if current user has any role of specified.
        参数:
        privileges - the array of roles.
        返回:
        true if has any role, otherwise false.

        Calculates an authorization key for user.

        返回:
